name: Surf Live
description: Surf Live is the first token to accommodate the development of the surf industry in the digital world. Starting from one of the most popular surf locations in the world, namely the Mentawai Islands, Indonesia, managed by an experienced surf charter operator since 1996, started as a small boat and now operates three boats designed to meet the needs of surfers when playing in the waves and resting in between surfing time and have served clients from various countries. Combine with lastest technology from cryptocurrency and support from community, Surf Live will expand and can be used in other locations around the world.
